name: The raft
description:
You have been stranded on an island and managed to build a raft for yourself, by using stowaway materials. The next step is to find a way to signal ships and aircraft that you are at sea, which is where the transmission theme comes to play.

The experience is tailored for the HTC Vive VR set and will only work on systems that support SteamVR with controllers. This is also a standing up experience as you are able to move around the raft.

HOW TO PLAY:
The thumb button on the Vive controller grabs the object and trigger uses it (flashlight).
